1.0.name: wordpress/media-from-ftp
1.0.description:
• Register to media library from files that have been uploaded by FTP.
  • Find the file for each type.
  • This create a thumbnail of the image file. Support ( jpg jpeg jpe gif png )

Why I made this? In the media uploader, you may not be able to upload by the environment of server. That's when the files are large. You do not mind the size of the file if FTP.
